mapper.update: UPDATE bank_card SET card_number = #{cardNumber}, bank_name = #{bankName}, card_type = #{cardType}, card_holder = #{cardHolder}, phone = #{phone}, is_default = #{isDefault}, status = #{status}, updated_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
